data.text: @SteveDaines Montana is last for mining you didn't do jack to save those miner's jobs at the Stillwater Mine. Why do you continue to vote for foreign ownership of our land and mines? You are no friend to mining.

@SteveDaines You're joking right? You still have not responded to me about the BLM in Montana. You apparently support the BLM head stating there will never be an operational mine in Montana and will shutdown every small miner.
@SteveDaines What specifically are you doing to hold those in the Epstein files accountable?
@SteveDaines Do your part and D.I.G. Senator.
@SteveDaines MSHA certified for 23 years. Thanks Senator!
@SteveDaines Ok good how about bringing the laid off miners of Stillwater mine back to work in our home state? Back to there families?
@SteveDaines Unsurprisingly the #mtgop loves to celebrate minors
